title: Terraform Industries Scales Atmospheric Hydrocarbon Synthesis Technology
summary: Clean tech company developing industrial-scale systems to produce synthetic natural gas from atmospheric carbon
content: Completed demonstration of high-pressure reactor injection system, Raised $26M for Mark One Terraformer development, Added multiple team members including engineers and interns, Achieved 99.4% methane purity with Gen 4 reactor, Produced pipeline-grade natural gas from sunlight and CO2, Reached green hydrogen costs below $2.50/kg-H2
